jobs.title: Associate Technical Artist
accomplishments: Created custom scripts in C#, MEL, and Python to solve never before encountered problems
Participated in code reviews to minimize impact of rolling out breaking changes
Supported artists by using Nintendo Switch development kits by performing setups, upgrading SDK, trouble shooting rendering issues, and documenting the whole process

sectionAccomplishments: Collaborated with a team of eleven people, six of those developers
Worked in an Agile setting with two week sprints and multiple user stores per sprint
Created acceptance tests, time estimates, and subtasks for each user story
Performed code reviews to ensure code quality was maintained
Continued developing a single-page web application using Angular.js
Transformed the frontend using FontAwesome Icons, Glyphicons, and Twitter Bootstrap
Used JAXB Objects to communicate between other subcomponents via an ActiveMQ queue
Developed a RESTful backend to service the HMI using Spring MVC and Java 8
Expanded upon existing Hibernate JPA Mappings for a PostGreSQL database
Ensured that the database migration was as painless as possible by using Flyaway

jobs.title: Application Developer
accomplishments: Designed Stored Procedures, Stored Functions, Indices, Views, Tables, PL/SQL programs for Oracle 11g database using SQL Developer
Optimized Views, Stored Procedures, and Stored Functions to reduce running time
Solved custom changes to the database using critical thinking and out of the box approaches

jobs.title: Junior Data Analyst, Co-op
accomplishments: Developed custom solutions in C# and Java for teammates in an individual setting
Decreased a weekly chronic job’s time from four hours to fifteen minutes through automated scripts, reducing the number of people required from seven to two
